channel.title: Step by Step on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Where Nobody Knows Your Name
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: One of the last acts of David Bowie, supreme rock star of the past 50 years who died Monday morning, was the release of his album, Blackstar. One of the ways Bowie promoted the closing chapter of his work was by doing something that he hadn’t done much of over the years: he gave the title track to the album to the producers of The Last Panthers, a new TV show in the U.
